text: Lee William Tockar (born February 11, 1969) is a Canadian voice actor and visual artist. ==Works== He works for several studios in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. He is also a writer of children's literature, a musician, sculptor, illustrator and collected painter. Tockar is best known for his work on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, Eugene "Bling Bling Boy" Hamilton in Johnny Test, George in George of the Jungle, Doktor Frogg on League of Super Evil, the titular character of Yakkity Yak, the evil Makuta Teridax in the Bionicle films and Fidgel from 3-2-1 Penguins!. He also founded FanBuilt.com. ==Other websites== * * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Blind people Category:Actors from British Columbia Category:Canadian Christians Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Canadian television writers Category:Canadian voice actors Category:People from Kelowna
title: Lee Tockar
